Episodes.Title: Episode 1
Episodes.Plot: Luther returns to work after a traumatic arrest to investigate the murder of a former child genius's parents, and quickly deduces that their daughter is responsible. However, unable to find evidence to convict, he becomes embroiled in a battle of wits with the suspect - who has set her sights on him and his estranged wife.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
Episodes.GuestStars: Paul McGann, Ruth Wilson, Saskia Reeves

Episodes.Title: Episode 2
Episodes.Plot: A gunman begins murdering uniformed police officers, prompting the detective to taunt the killer on TV in the hope of inspiring him to turn his anger on him and come out into the open. To his horror, Luther also learns that Alice Morgan has been investigating his past - and is threatening to tell Zoe what she has discovered.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 3
Episodes.Plot: John Luther must catch a Satanic occult killer accused of kidnap and murder. However, with a young mother's life at stake, Luther must use all his skills to build an airtight case.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 4
Episodes.Plot: When a serial killer goes on the rampage, Luther must put his personal life aside and delve inside the murderer's mind to discover what is driving him to kill so many girls, and why.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and content that may offend

Episodes.Title: Episode 5
Episodes.Plot: When a wealthy couple are taken hostage, Luther must try to avert a disastrous chain of events. However, what he doesn't know is that it will soon become very personal.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 6
Episodes.Plot: Luther, suspected of murder, goes on the run to try and prove his innocence. With Alice's assistance, they set out together to exact revenge on the real killer.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language and content that may offend
